summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of Perkins Lane, from West Armour Street to the southeasterly line of Shurick Extension of Carleton Beach Tracts, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 5725, appropriating additional money therefor, and amending Section 1 of Ordinance No. 75593, as amended.
